lists.title: Best Fantasy of the 2020s
lists.description: The 2020s saw a resurgence of imaginative worlds, fantasy adventures, and escapist storytelling, blending myth, magic, and the supernatural.

lists.title: Best Fantasy of the 2010s
lists.description: The 2010s featured rich fantasy worlds, blending complex storytelling with imaginative, fantastical elements.
posts: VALERIAN AND THE CITY OF A THOUSAND PLANETS

lists.title: Best Fantasy of the 2000s
lists.description: The 2000s delivered visually stunning fantasy films, rich in imaginative storytelling and epic adventures.
posts: HARRY POTTER AND THE PRISONER OF AZKABAN
NARNIA: THE LION, THE WITCH AND THE WARDROBE

lists.title: Best Fantasy of the 1990s
lists.description: The 1990s brought a wave of fantasy classics, featuring imaginative worlds, magical quests, and unforgettable adventures.
posts: THE LORD OF THE RINGS: THE FELLOWSHIP OF THE RING
HARRY POTTER AND THE SORCERER'S STONE

lists.title: Best Fantasy of the 1980s
lists.description: The 1980s were defined by imaginative fantasy adventures, from mythic quests to fantastical creatures and magical realms.

lists.title: Best Fantasy of the 1970s
lists.description: The 1970s were a golden era for imaginative, psychedelic fantasy, blending myth and reality in unforgettable adventures.

lists.title: Best Fantasy of the 1960s
lists.description: The 1960s brought surreal and psychedelic fantasy, blending mythology, science fiction, and whimsical storytelling.
posts: IT'S A MAD, MAD, MAD, MAD WORLD
THE PRINCESS WHO FELL FROM THE SKY

lists.title: Best Fantasy of the 1950s
lists.description: The 1950s paved the way for classic fantasy with mythological tales, sword and sorcery adventures, and futuristic imaginings.
posts: THE CREATURE FROM THE BLACK LAGOON
THE DAY THE EARTH STOOD STILL
